item.title: Trump voters stand by their vote, but some have concerns about prices and tariffs
item.description: Polling shows most Americans disapprove of Trump on the economy. But his voters largely say they’re still confident in him with a few concerns.

item.title: Trump’s first 100 days tests both Republican, Democratic parties' futures: ANALYSIS
item.description: His low approval ratings could be a liability for vulnerable Republicans.

item.title: 'Unprecedented': How Trump has pushed the limits of presidential power in 100 days
item.description: President Donald Trump, in his first 100 days in office, has wielded his pen to radically implement his agenda at a breakneck pace.

item.title: 2 dead, 1 injured in Alaska plane crash
item.description: The deadly plane crash took place in Nanwalek, Alaska, authorities said.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump had 'positive talk' with Hegseth amid Signal fallout
item.description: Trump, in an interview with The Atlantic, said he's had a "positive talk" with Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth following the fallout from Hegseth's use...
